Message:
We stood atop her altar
surrounded by crystals.

Ophelia had completely
descended into madness.
As we crossed swords,
I screamed to her.

I lost you, and for that,
I finally realized...!

If a ruler must walk
their path alone,
then I am not befitting
of a queen after all!

And the one thing
I truly needed was not
that promise—it was you!

The two of us
go in for the kill.

Our swords collide
in a thunderous clash.

Plummeting from the sky,
Executioner drives its blade
into a crystal atop the altar,
cleaving it into two...
The battle has reached its end.

Unconscious, Ophelia starts
to collapse, but I catch her
before she hits the altar floor.

The ominous lights vanished,
and the light of dawn bathed
the altar in its warm shine.
